column1: Little Goat Diner////Went to Little Goat for a quick dinner
column2: and it was good but not great. It's casual and quick
column3: and the service was very fast. For food we got the This Little Piggy Went to China
column4: which was the best with a unique take on a breakfast sandwich and I liked it a lot. We also got the Korean Chicken Tacos
column6: nothing that special. The Bloody Mary was the same
column7: good but not amazing. Little Goat was good and the food was good
column8: would get the This Little Piggy Went to China again
column9: but there are better places in the area that are more unique.
